sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { Route, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { AuthService } from '../auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-signup', templateUrl: './signup.component.html', styleUrls: ['./signup.component.scss'] }) export class SignupComponent { signupForm = new FormGroup({ username : new FormControl("", Validators.required), firstname : new FormControl("", Validators.required), lastname : new FormControl("", Validators.required), email: new FormControl('', [Validators.required, Validators.email]), mobile: new FormControl('', [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(10),Validators.maxLength(10), Validators.pattern("^[0-9]*$")]), password: new FormControl('', [Validators.required, Validators.pattern("^(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*[0-9])(?=.*[!@#$%^&*_=+-]).{8,12}$")]) }) submitted = false msg:any // mobileFormat = '(000)000-0000'; // emailPattern = '^[a-z0-9._%+-]+@[a-z0-9.-]+\\.[a-z]{2,4}$'; constructor(private router:Router, private authservice:AuthService){} signup(data:object){ this.submitted = true console.log(data) this.authservice.doSignup(data).subscribe((res:any)=>{ if(res) this.router.navigate(['otpVerification']); }, (err:any)=>{ this.msg = err } ) } login(){ this.router.navigate(['login']) } togglePassword(event:any){ console.log("called",event) } }
Signup
{{msg}}
*Username is Invalid *Username is required
*First name is required *Last name is required
*Email is Invalid *Email is required *Mobile is Invalid *Mobile is required
*Password is required *Password is must be valid (Ex: Abc@1234)
OR
Login in with Facebook
Already have account ? Do Login
